titles.title: Expressing profound sorrow upon the death of Luis Jimenez and recognizing his distinguished career and great contributions to American art.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: 7/28/2006--Introduced. Declares that the House of Representatives expresses profound sorrow at the untimely death of Luis Jimenez and recognizes his distinguished career and great contributions to American art.
